conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: For those who enjoy sci-fi and time travel, I recommend "The Time Traveler's Wife" (2003). The movie stars Eric Bana as Henry DeTamble, a man with a genetic disorder that allows him to involuntarily time travel. The plot explores the challenges of their relationship due to his unique condition.
